ComponentInfoProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

Base class containing information common to all application components (PageInfo, DelegateInfo).

This class is not intended to be used by itself; it is simply here to share common definitions between all application components.

Global information about the Application.

int32_t gaia::core::ComponentInfo::getIconResource ( ) const

Return the icon resource identifier to use for this component.

If the component defines an icon, that is used; else, the application icon is used.

Returns:
The icon associated with this component.
base::String gaia::core::ComponentInfo::getProcessName ( ) const

Get process name.

Returns:
The name of the process this component should run in. From the "process" attribute or, if not set, the same as applicationInfo.processName.
graphics::Drawer* gaia::core::ComponentInfo::loadIconN ( const PackageManager &  pm) const

Get Icon.

Parameters:
pmA PackageManager from which the icon can be loaded.
Returns:
Returns an icon. And Drawer pointer need to be released after used.

Reimplemented from gaia::core::PackageItemInfo.

base::String gaia::core::ComponentInfo::loadLabel ( const PackageManager &  pm) const

Retrieve the current textual label associated with this item.

This will call back on the given PackageManager to load the label from the application.

Parameters:
pmA PackageManager from which the label can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
Returns:
Returns a String containing the item's label. If the item does not have a label, its name is returned.

Reimplemented from gaia::core::PackageItemInfo.
